title: ICYMI - Antoni Porowski Connects People to Their Food and Each Other with "Antoni in the Kitchen"
itunes:title: ICYMI - Antoni Porowski Connects People to Their Food and Each Other with "Antoni in the Kitchen"
description:
Antoni talks about the power of food to bring people together, learning to express himself through cooking, and how he learns from perfect strangers on "Queer Eye."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
